```{r include=F}
library(tidyverse)
library(pcalg)
library(Rgraphviz)
```
```{r}
set.seed(42)
n <- 1000
data <- tibble(
  X = rnorm(n),
  M = 1 + rnorm(n),
  Y = X - X*M + rnorm(n)
)

data %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = X, y = Y)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = 'lm', formula = y ~ x, se = FALSE) +
  ggtitle('Y ~ X')

data %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = X, y = Y, color = M > 0)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = 'lm', formula = y ~ x, se = FALSE) +
  ggtitle('Y ~ X by M')

pc(list(C = cor(data), n = nrow(data)),
   indepTest = gaussCItest,
   labels = colnames(data),
   alpha = 0.01,
   verbose = T) %>%
  plot
```
